title: Replace coin image with new uploaded coin (transparent background)

requirements.summary: Replace the current primary coin image (pointless-coin-new.dim_512x512.png) with the newly provided coin image (pointless-coin-p.dim_512x512.png) across all components where the coin image appears
acceptanceCriteria: The new coin image (pointless-coin-p.dim_512x512.png) is saved to frontend/public/assets/generated/ with a transparent background (no white checkerboard or white fill behind the coin).
HeroSection renders the new coin image in place of the previous coin image.
Navigation logo renders the new coin image.
AboutSection renders the new coin image.
CommunitySection CTA banner renders the new coin image.
No component on the site still references the old coin image filenames for visible display.
The transparent background ensures the coin blends naturally against the dark site background.

file_operations.description: Update the floating coin image src attribute to reference frontend/public/assets/generated/pointless-coin-p.dim_512x512.png instead of the current pointless-coin-new.dim_512x512.png. Ensure the coin renders with transparent background blending naturally against the dark hero section background.

Update the navigation logo coin image src attribute to reference frontend/public/assets/generated/pointless-coin-p.dim_512x512.png instead of the current coin image. Verify the transparent background works correctly in the fixed top navigation bar against the dark background.

Update the two-column section coin image src attribute to reference frontend/public/assets/generated/pointless-coin-p.dim_512x512.png instead of pointless-coin-new.dim_512x512.png. Ensure the glow effects and transparent background render correctly.

Update the CTA banner floating coin image src attribute to reference frontend/public/assets/generated/pointless-coin-p.dim_512x512.png instead of the current coin image. Verify the transparent background blends naturally with the banner background.

Update the footer brand logo coin image src attribute (if present) to reference frontend/public/assets/generated/pointless-coin-p.dim_512x512.png instead of any previous coin image reference. Ensure the transparent background works correctly in the footer context.
